Question
========

A first vase contains two white and three black balls, a second vase contains three white and one black. If you randomly choose one of the two vases and you draw a little ball from it, what is the probability that this ball is black?

Answerlist
----------

* 2/4
* 1/4
* 4/9
* 17/40

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 2/4: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
* 4/9: Incorrect
* 17/40: Correct
